content.title: My name is Ekaterina.
content.text:
I'm a front-end developer with 4 years of experience, and I am in love with micro animations and new technologies.

I enjoy working with media and interactive projects. Feel proud when seeing how people use the results of my work.

Currently, I’m based in Riga. I think this city is a beautiful and calm place, ideal for maintaining a balance between life and work.
I’m interested in projects for media, projects with unusual UI/UX, and interactive projects.

experience.stack: React, Typescript, Less CSS, Redux, JavaScript, PHP
Vue JS, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SVG
